00010 Police::Police(GameWorld* world, ngl::Obj *_mesh) : Agent(world)
00011 {
00012   m_entityType = typePolice;
00013 
00014   registerClass(L);
00015 
00016   // Set up state machine
00017   m_stateMachine = new StateMachine<Police>(this);
00018 
00019   // Set initial variables
00020   m_mesh = _mesh;
00021 
00022   m_isMoving = false;
00023   m_validPursuit = true;
00024 
00025   m_hopHeight = 0.5;
00026   m_hopSpeed = 0.0;
00027   luabridge::LuaRef makePolice = luabridge::getGlobal(L, "makePolice");
00028   makePolice();
00029 
00030   m_blockadePosition = NULL;
00031   Vehicle::Steering()->WallAvoidOn();
00032   Vehicle::Steering()->setWallAvoidWeight(0.4);
00033   Vehicle::Steering()->ObstacleAvoidOn();
00034 
00035   m_rioterInfluence = 0.0;
00036 
00037   Vehicle::setMaxSpeed(3);
00038 }

00050 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 void Police::update(double timeElapsed, double currentTime)
00052 {
00053   //make a friendly and opposing neightbours vector as seperation wants all neighbours bu alignment & cohesion doesn't
00054   Vehicle::Steering()->clearFriendlyNeighbours();
00055   Vehicle::Steering()->clearAllNeighbours();
00056   Vehicle::Steering()->addFriendlyNeighbours(getNeighbourPoliceIDs());
00057   Vehicle::Steering()->addAllNeighbours(getNeighbourRioterIDs());
00058   Vehicle::Steering()->addAllNeighbours(getNeighbourPoliceIDs());
00059 
00060   Vehicle::Steering()->WallOverlapAvoidance();
00061   Vehicle::Steering()->ObjectOverlapAvoidance();
00062 
00063   //call agent and state machine update
00064   Agent::update(timeElapsed, currentTime);
00065   m_stateMachine->update();
00066 
00067   // calculate influence of neighbouring rioters based on their rage
00068   int nearbyRioters = m_neighbourRioterIDs.size();
00069   m_rioterInfluence = 0.0;
00070 
00071 
00072   for (int i=0; i<nearbyRioters; i++)
00073   {
00074     Agent* rioter = dynamic_cast<Agent*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(m_neighbourRioterIDs[i]));
00075     if (rioter)
00076     {
00077       m_rioterInfluence += rioter->getRage();
00078     }
00079   }
00080 
00081   m_hopSpeed = 10.f;
00082   m_hop = (sin((currentTime*m_hopSpeed)+m_ID)*sin((currentTime*m_hopSpeed)+m_ID)*m_hopHeight);
00083 
00084   //if they have a blockade position (Wall State is on) then set this to the crosshair
00085   if(m_blockadePosition != NULL)
00086   {
00087     this->setCrosshair(m_blockadePosition);
00088     if((this->getPos() - m_blockadePosition).lengthSquared() <= 0.01)
00089     {
00090       this->Steering()->ArriveOff();
00091     }
00092     else
00093     {
00094       this->Steering()->ArriveOn();
00095     }
00096   }
00097 }

00101 {
00102   loadMatricesToShader(cam, mouseGlobalTX);
00103   m_mesh->draw();
00104 }

00106 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00107 void Police::loadMatricesToShader(ngl::Camera *cam, ngl::Mat4 mouseGlobalTX)
00108 {
00109   ngl::ShaderLib *shader=ngl::ShaderLib::instance();
00110       (*shader)["Phong"]->use();
00111 
00112   ngl::Material m(ngl::Colour(0.2f,0.2f,0.2f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.2775f,0.2775f,0.2775f, 1.0), ngl::Colour(0.77391f,0.77391f,0.77391f, 1.0));
00113   m.setSpecularExponent(5.f);
00114   m.setDiffuse(ngl::Colour(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f-(1-(getHealth()/100.0f)), 1.0f));
00115   m.loadToShader("material");
00116 
00117 
00118   ngl::Mat4 MV;
00119   ngl::Mat4 MVP;
00120   ngl::Mat3 normalMatrix;
00121   ngl::Mat4 M;
00122   ngl::Transformation trans;
00123   trans.setPosition(getPos().m_x,m_hop,getPos().m_z);
00124 
00125   ngl::Real rot = atan(getHeading().m_z/getHeading().m_x);
00126 
00127   rot = ((rot * 180)/M_PI);
00128 
00129   if(getHeading().m_x < 0)
00130   {
00131     rot = 180 + rot;
00132   }
00133 
00134   trans.setRotation(0,-rot+90,0);
00135 
00136   M=trans.getMatrix()*mouseGlobalTX;
00137   MV=  M*cam->getViewMatrix();
00138   MVP= M*cam->getVPMatrix();
00139   normalMatrix=MV;
00140   normalMatrix.inverse();
00141   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MV",MV);
00142   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("MVP",MVP);
00143   shader->setShaderParamFromMat3("normalMatrix",normalMatrix);
00144   shader->setShaderParamFromMat4("M",M);
00145 
00146 }

00148 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00150 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 void Police::findTargetID(float _health)
00152 {
00153   std::vector<int> rioters = getNeighbourRioterIDs();
00154   float currentRage = -1;
00155   Agent* currentTarget = NULL;
00156   for (int i=0; i<rioters.size(); i++)
00157   {
00158     Agent* rioter = dynamic_cast<Agent*>(m_entityMgr->getEntityFromID(rioters[i]));
00159     if (rioter)
00160     {
00161       if (rioter->getHealth()>_health && rioter->getRage()>currentRage)
00162       {
00163         currentRage = rioter->getRage();
00164         currentTarget = rioter;
00165       }
00166     }
00167   }
00168 
00169   if (currentTarget == NULL)
00170   {
00171     setTargetID(-1);
00172   }
00173   else
00174   {
00175     int target = currentTarget->getID();
00176     setTargetID(target);
00177   }
00178 }

00180 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 void Police::checkValidPursuitRange(float _dist)
00184 {
00185   ngl::Vec3 toSquad = m_pos - m_squadPos;
00186   double distSqFromEachOther = toSquad.lengthSquared();
00187 
00188   // make 2 checks so that the police don't get stuck on the edge of the check
00189   if (m_validPursuit)
00190   {
00191     if(distSqFromEachOther > (_dist * _dist))
00192     {
00193       m_targetID = -1;
00194       m_validPursuit = false;
00195     }
00196   }
00197 
00198   else
00199   {
00200     m_validPursuit = true;
00201     if(distSqFromEachOther > (_dist * _dist )- ((_dist* _dist)/4.0))
00202     {
00203       m_targetID = -1;
00204       m_validPursuit = false;
00205     }
00206   }
00207 }

00219 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00220 bool Police::handleMessage(const Message& _message)
00221 {
00222   switch(_message.m_message)
00223   {
00224   case msgAttack:
00225     m_health -= (_message.m_extraInfo * m_timeElapsed);
00226     return true;
00227     break;
00228 
00229   default:
00230     std::cout<<"Police: Message type not defined"<<std::endl;
00231     return false;
00232     break;
00233   }
00234 }

00238 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00239 void Police::attack()
00240 {
00241   m_messageMgr->sendMessage(this->getID(), this->getTargetID(), msgAttack, m_damage);
00242 }
00243 
00244 void Police::death()
00245 {
00246   for (int i = 0; i < m_world->getNumberOfRioters(); i++)
00247   {
00248     ngl::Vec3 vecToRioter = m_world->getRioters()[i]->getPos() - m_pos;
00249     double distSqToRioter = vecToRioter.lengthSquared();
00250     double affectedRadius = 8.0;
00251     if (distSqToRioter < affectedRadius * affectedRadius)
00252     {
00253       m_messageMgr->sendMessage(this->getID(), m_world->getRioters()[i]->getID(), msgPoliceDeath, 0.f);
00254     }
00255   }
00256 }

00260 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00261 void Police::squadCohesion(double weight)
00262 {
00263   if(weight <= 0.0)
00264   {
00265     Vehicle::Steering()->SquadCohesionOff();
00266   }
00267   else
00268   {
00269     ngl::Vec3 toSquad = m_pos - m_squadPos;
00270     double distance = fabs(toSquad.length());
00271 
00272     weight = (weight*distance*1.5f)/m_squadRadius;
00273 
00274 
00275     Vehicle::setSquadCrosshair(m_squadPos);
00276     Vehicle::Steering()->setSquadCohesionWeight(weight);
00277 
00278     Vehicle::Steering()->SquadCohesionOn();
00279   }
00280 
00281 }

00285 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00286 void Police::registerClass(lua_State* _L)
00287 {
00288   // Set up LUA state
00289   luaL_dofile(L, "lua/Police.lua");
00290   luaL_openlibs(L);
00291 
00292   registerLua(_L);
00293   luabridge::getGlobalNamespace(_L)
00294     .deriveClass<Police, Agent>("Police")
00295       .addConstructor <void (*) (GameWorld*, ngl::Obj*)> ()
00296         .addFunction("attack", &Police::attack)
00297         .addFunction("getRioterInfluence", &Police::getRioterInfluence)
00298         .addFunction("squadCohesion", &Police::squadCohesion)
00299         .addFunction("findPathHome", &Police::findPathHome)
00300         .addProperty("m_isMoving", &Police::getIsMoving, &Police::setIsMoving)
00301         .addFunction("checkValidPursuitRange", &Police::checkValidPursuitRange)
00302 
00303     .endClass();
00304 
00305   luabridge::push(L, this);
00306   lua_setglobal(L, "police");
00307 }
